Chinese.initTips: 初始化环境成功, 按下 %%1 + %%2 + %%3 阅读使用说明, %%4 + %%5 退出程序, %%6,切换语言
Chinese.helperTips: 退出程序请按%%1+%%2, %%3加%%4控制音量和语速, %%5播报敌人信息,%%6,开启自动提醒,%%7,切换提醒模式,%%8,缩短提醒间隔,%%9,增加提醒间隔, %%10加%%11,保存角色位置, %%12加%%13,传送到保存的位置, %%14,血量信息,%%15,蓝量信息,%%16,异常状态信息, 退出程序请按%%17+%%18
Chinese.tpNotInGameTips: 未进入游戏世界，无法传送
Chinese.tpGameProcessNotExistTips: 未检测到游戏, 毛都获取不到啊

English.initTips: Initialized successful, press %%1 + %%2 + %%3 to read user guide, %%4 + %%5 exit the helper, press %%6 to switch language
English.helperTips: press %%1+%%2 to exit program , %%3+%%4 to control volume and speed, %%5 to get enemy info,%%6,start auto remind,%%7,switch remind mode,%%8,decrease remind period,%%9,increase remind period, %%10+%%11,save player position, %%12+%%13,teleport to saved position, %%14,HP info,%%15,MP info,%%16,buff info, perss %%17+%%18 to exit the helper
English.tpNotInGameTips: you didn't start the game, can not teleport
English.tpGameProcessNotExistTips: can not find game process, teleport failed
English.gameDetectedTips: game detected, loading the helper program
